title.rendered: Air Iceland Connect Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Air Iceland Connect, which is a part of Icelandair Group, is a dynamic company with firm roots that go back to the start of aviation in Iceland. Air Iceland Connect is a flexible yet powerful airline servicing domestic flights in Iceland and the North Atlantic countries. Air Iceland Connect flies from Reykjavik to Isafjordur, Akureyri and Egilsstadir, as well as to Kulusuk, Narsarsuaq, Nuuk and Ilulissat in Greenland. In addition, Air Iceland Connect offers flights to the Faroe Islands. Air Iceland Connect has three Bombardier Q400 airplanes and three Bombardier Q200 airplanes. The head office of Air Iceland Connect is located in the capital, Reykjavik, but the company’s registered domicile is in Akureyri, the main town in north Iceland. Both Reykjavik Airport and Akureyri Airport serve as hubs for Air Iceland Connect route network.

Phone Number : Information : +354 570 3000

Call Center : +354 570 3030

Business hours :Mondays – Fridays from 07:00 until 18:00 GMT and 09:00 until 16:00 GMT during weekends.

Address : Air Iceland Connect – Reykjavik Airport – 101 Reykjavik

Email:  airicelandconnect@airicelandconnect.is

Air Iceland Connect Official website: https://www.airicelandconnect.com/

Air Iceland Connect Baggage Allowance

Air Iceland Connect Baggage Allowance

View Air Iceland Connect Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Air Iceland Connect Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in Air Iceland Connect :

Expectant mothers in their last month of pregnancy, must have medical approval for travel issued within 72 hours prior to commencement of travel.

For more details visit : https://www.airicelandconnect.com/information/special-assistance/pregnant-women

Travelling with pet in Air Iceland Connect : 

For more details visit : https://www.airicelandconnect.com/information/special-assistance/traveling-with-pet

Air Iceland Connect Fleet

Bombardier Q400

Bombardier Q200

 Queries handled Air Iceland Connect Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Icelandair Saga Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Iceland Connect  Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Iceland Connect : (click on the stars below)
